name: Bristol Codehub
description: A place to code, share, and learn from one another, and make connections within the industry. It is aimed at anybody who is interested in learning and sharing their knowledge, beginners and experienced developers alike.

time.details: A social coding and tech meetup for anyone, regardless of level of experience. It's a chill event where you can work on those side projects youâ€™ve been putting off, team up with others, or tackle some coding challenges.

location.address: DeskLodge House, 2 Redcliffe Way, Redcliffe, Bristol BS1 6NL

cost.details: Free to join, no sign up necessary.

time.details: A non-competitive, mixed group coding session, where people of all levels are welcome.
